post.body: excellent! i've been a good boy this year....i think.
no, mcdonalds made a 25 cent profit off of me
sadly, i read that just fine. :P
texting is so....5 years ago. :D
I know I can txtmsg my updates. But I want an app like TwitterBerry that gets the updates as well as sends them. :)
"awesomer"?!? Hehe. I do have a 160gb ipod classic. Maybe I should try it again and see what happens. I don't want to brick it.
rockbox isn't the only answer. I had an ipod mini 4gb silver back in the day and ran rockbox on it. Was...ok at best.
I'll have to check them out. Thanks for the suggestion.
yeah, but aren't those thing like fat or big or something?
trying to stay away from iPod. http://anythingbutipod.com/
I wish I had an iPhone, but I'm on T-Mobile. If I could get an unlocked iPhone that's not too expensive, I'm there. Any info?
naw, i have a blackberry
i think it might be more of a brain dump place than anything. using a #hash is useful in some places.
#digsby-wishlist : ability to post to Ping.fm, more URL shorteners like is.gd, twurl.com, tr.im and zi.ma to name a few. <3 Digsby!
#digsby-wishlist : Blogging capability with Blogger, LiveJournal, Wordpress, etc. If those were added, wouldn't need anything else.
Thing I did was google "blackberry" and looked at each site to see if they were any good. Your mileage may vary depending on needs.
are you looking for 'free' apps or 'cheap' apps? http://blackberryfreeware.com/ might be a good place to start.
I am BaD_CrC in ##c-u in case you forgot who I am. :)
can you do me a huge favor? Can you ask everyone in ##c-u if they have Twitter accounts and get their @usernames and DM me them.
jelous about what? The snow? Why would the make you jelous?
anybody in WA sitting at home and want to hear about the mess, http://wmc1.liquidviewer.net/KIRO
i got it! i want an app similar to twirl that can manage all the services that ping.fm can and receive updates from each service.
I got swindled by McDonalds. I only got 3 chicken nuggets insteaf of 4 for $1.
Listening to "The Saints" by Helloween from the album "Gambling with the Devil" on Last.FM
This weather doesn't scare me. My paycheck might scare me for days we don't work though. The days ahead look gloomy.
Just filled my gas tank up. Possibility of power going out. We have to run power inverters from our vehicles. No generator. Must improvise.
I wish someone would make an app for the BlackBerry that does what ping.fm does on the web. I'll even pay for it!
Snowmageddon '08 is hitting the Pacific Northwest USA. It is snowing at about an inch an hour. Wind blowing snow sideways. Please be safe!
Ubuntu Linux kernel update broke my wireless. Grr!
Rebooted my laptop and now I'm stuck with a "routine" fsck check. I guess it's ok. I don't think anything is wrong. *knock on wood*
Wow. Heading home finally. I have to get my ideas out on paper or something soon before I forget.
Is there a such thing as free web hosting with php+mysql abilities anymore. I need to make a couple of sites. Willing to ad for the provider
Work day is going a little longer than expected. No biggie. Mo money!
Just had an idea for a website. I really need a free webhost with php and mysql to kick off these ideas. Any ideas?
Whee! Work is actually fun today so far. Let's see if it lasts.
Good morning my friends. What's on the menu for today? Big plans. Finally I have a full day of work to do.
Is it bad if I go to bed, my cellphone within reach to tweet something I think of if I wake up? Does that mean I need Twitter Anonymous? :)
Good night my friends and family. Work tomorrow. Snow means I'll be doing most of the work again. YAY! :(
Honestly, can we bring back the 80's TV shows and movies? http://is.gd/eA91
Good news: it stopped snowing at about 2.5" on the ground... Bad news: I still have to work tomorrow. Gotta get up in 4 hours. Not tired.
